oai_dc:dc.dc:title: AN EXPERT DIAGNOSTIC-TOOL FOR ENGINEERING SYSTEMS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VERMA, AK
SEETHARAM, K
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An expert system designed as an aid to the diagnosis/troubleshooting maintenance of complex engineering systems is described. Frames are used for both factual and reasoning knowledge representation. Strategic inferencing using fuzzy logic is on the lines of CRIB. The system also generate minimal cutset which can be used for calculating failure probability, if needed. A case study of diagnostics of ship engine cooling system failure is also discussed.
